sense.def:
A household
sestavljajo vse osebe v družini ali skupini, ki živijo skupaj pod isto streho.

seg.quote: He loved being part of a huge household.
Only 8 per cent of households owned a fridge.

sense.def:
The household
je človekov dom in vse, kar je povezano s skrbjo zanj.

seg.quote: My daughter managed the entire household.
